name: Peggy the Peach
description:
Welcome to the planet Geona, a place where dreams live. Here we find a pretty peach by name of Peggy, and she loves gems. Speaking of gems, there is one with the power to maintain harmony and good dreams: the Ruby of Tranquility. One stormy night, a giant witch by name of Shatrella destroyed the ruby. The fragments scattered throughout the planet, and darkness loomed over the joy that once reigned.

Peggy liked the ruby and the happiness it brought, so she decided to find the shards. As for the witch, Peggy had a great evil to punish. Using her keen senses, she knew the fragments resided somewhere in the 12 regions of the planet. Each one presented great ordeals to overcome. Go, Peggy! Retrieve the lost fragments, and defeat the vile villain!
